transcript:
Haan ji branch ji ji.
Ji sir call disconnect ho gaya tha to main keh raha tha is pe bilkul bilkul iska workout sir abhi karenge.
Aur jaise hi lead generate hogi na thoda sa fir aapka dekhna abhi perception bhi change hoga thoda sa cheez really change hogi aur mera number hai mujhe kabhi bhi connect kar lijiyega number maine aapko de rakha hai.
Han ji han ji.
Okay okay baki ha baki abhi workout karenge.
Ji bilkul bilkul abhi aapka ek concern tha isko main close kar do sir ek feedback mail aayega parso ko de dijiye.
Koi dikkat nahi sir.
Thik hai okay connect kar lijiye se do utarna hai thik hai.
Han bilkul bilkul bilkul bataenge workout karke.
Sir recording hi hoga baki main kuch products agar ho sakte hain main aapki industry ke do teen aur computer analyze karunga koi keyword add kar sakta hai thoda sa wahi thoda sa dekhna hai bas baki to isme koi other option nahi hai agar main bolunga to galat hi hoga yahi ek iska solution hai agar ho sakta hai to otherwise to demand ke basis pe hi hame baithna padega.
Okay okay sahi baat hai aap dusre ka bhi workout kariye aur us tarah se hamara bhi kya ho raha hai.
Bilkul okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's call got disconnected.

- Wants workout on leads.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to workout on leads.

- Executive will close the concern.

- Executive will analyze competitors and keywords.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will give feedback after two days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, workout, feedback, keywords, competitors
